caseTitle: Against involvement of Zafar Iqbal Gondal, Former Chairman, EOBI, DG Investment and DG HR, etc in multibillion scam in the Employees Old Age Benefit Institute
tagline: The hearing in the matter of multi billion scam in EOBI is adjourned and the counsel for EOBI may seek further instruction in the matter as regards various proposals noted in the order. The other parties are also required to make compliance of various directions contained in this order and the earlier order of this Court.
